title: New Cascadia Traditional
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A dedicated gluten free bakery that was previously all veg, but since July 2010 also serves sandwiches containing meat as reported to HC. Baguettes, bagels, pizza, baked goods, tea, coffee, and more. Also operates booths at farmers markets (see website).
